description: This is a C# source file implementing a REST API for a simple notes application using ASP.NET Core Minimal API approach. It handles CRUD operations on notes stored in-memory, with OpenAPI/Swagger setup for API documentation, and CORS configuration for frontend integration.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with ID, title, content, creation and update timestamps.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object for creating a new note.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object for updating an existing note.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesStore
classes.description: In-memory thread-safe storage for notes with methods for CRUD operations.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Returns all notes in the store.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Adds a new note to the store.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its ID.
